Tuesday ‚Äì Thursday
3-10 PM
Friday & Saturday

Sunday

Monday

Row Backgrounds
Location
Row Backgrounds
Today's Tap List
CURRENT TAP LIST ‚Äî Updated 8/4/25
HOPPY
72 PALE ALE
Bright, citrusy, & floral with a light copper hue. | ABV: 5.6%
2023 Best Florida Beer Bronze Medal Winner
DEEP SPACE COLD BLACK IPA
While the name may be contradictory, the flavors are anything but. Notes of espresso meld with dank citrus and hints of cannabis, courtesy of a heavy dose of cryo Simcoe hops. Finishes ultra-clean from its cold lager fermentation. ‚ÄúIt is the unknown that defines our existence.‚Äù | ABV: 6.5%
DEVILS MILHOPPER WEST COAST IPA 
Brewed and dry hopped with experimental hops that give huge, ripe pineapple aroma with zesty citrus and melon notes. A little dankness rounds out this hop bomb.ABV: 5.7%
LOPSIDED HAZY IPA
Brewed with Erebus, Mosaic, and Vic Secret hops. Pineapple and passion fruit character mingle with sprucey pine notes. Vic Secret in the dry hop imparts a bit of edgy lemon pith that really quenches your thirst.| 6.7% ABV.
TIGER SHARK HAZY IPA
Hazy IPA with loads of Citra hops, and in keeping with the theme, a new hop variety called ‚ÄúAnchovy.‚Äù Nothing fishy here, just potent aromas of peach nectar, fresh squeezed lime juice, and a touch of raspberry candy. | ABV: 6.7%
URSA AMERICAN IPA
Medium-bodied, intense citrus hop flavors, with a burly malt backbone. | ABV: 7.1%
2019 Best Florida Beer Silver Medal Winner
LIGHT
AMARILLO MOLE-STYLE GOLDEN ALE
A unique blonde ale that pays tribute to mole spices frequently used in Oaxacan dishes. Real Cacao, cinnamon, and a dash of chipotle pepper enhance this flavorful yet drinkable beer. | ABV: 6.1%
BIKE LANE CRUISER CITRUS RADLER 
A mixed citrus soda (orange, lemon, lime) combined with our Party Barge Pilsner makes for a crisp, refreshing, moderately sweet, low abv brew that‚Äôll go down smooth all day long.| ABV: 2.9%
HONEY BEE CITRUS BLONDE ALE 
A light-bodied, slightly sweet citrus blonde ale brewed with Florida wildflower honey. Citrusy aroma, a subtle honey sweetness, with a crisp and clean finish. | ABV: 5.4%
KARST WITH HERBS BELGIAN-STYLE PALE ALE 
Minimally hoppy compared to its American counterpart, this pale ale exhibits fruity/spicy yeast notes and a subtly toasty malt backbone. After fermentation it was infused with fresh, locally grown Lemon Thyme, Rosemary, and White Sage. 5.5% | ABV: 5.5%
TRAVELER‚ÄôS CZECH BOHEMIAN-STYLE PILSNER
This crisp, golden pilsner balances rich, bready malt with a smooth, rounded bitterness and a hint of spice from Saaz hops. Clean, refreshing, and brewed for the journey ‚Äì no passport required. | ABV: 5.8%
VEGA BLONDE ALE
Light, clean, slightly hoppy, pale golden ale. | ABV: 4.9%
2018 World Beer Cup Silver Award Winner
WAKULA HEFEWEIZEN
Traditional Bavarian-style hefeweizen with a light, wheat malt sweetness, coupled with banana, clove, and vanilla notes. | 5.4%
2020 Best Florida Beer Silver Award Winner
MALT-FORWARD
DRIFT SESSION BROWN ALE
Nutty, coffee, and chocolate notes highlight this light-bodied brown ale. | ABV: 4.4%
2023 World Beer Cup Gold Award Winner
INDIGO SCHWARZBIER
This dark lager glides across the palate with subtle notes of chocolate, coffee, and dark caramel, while staying light, roasty, and ridiculously drinkable. Smooth as a serpent in the sun. | ABV: 4.8%
SMOOTH SAILING OATMEAL STOUT 
A bold, Oatmeal Stout featuring notes of chocolate, caramel, toffee and a hint of dark cherry. | ABV: 6.6%
450 BLENDED AMBER ALE
Once a ‚Äúsecret menu‚Äù item, our 450 blends two of our award-winning core beers into a smooth, medium-bodied, and delicious Amber Ale. | ABV: 4.7%
SOUR-FRUITY
SALTWATER INTRUSION RASPBERRY + LIME GOSE
Brewed with real raspberries, limes, coriander, and a pinch of sea salt, this latest rendition of our popular sour wheat beer might remind you of a raspberry margarita! ABV: 4.7%
CHERRY LIMEADE SOUR ALE
Kettle sour brewed with dark sweet cherry and lime. Fruity, tart and crisp. | ABV: 5.8%
CIDER
BRIGHTSIDE HARD APPLE CIDER
New World cider that strikes a balance between tart and sweet, with a hint of oak tannin keeping it crisp¬† | ABV: 6.0%
BERRY NICE TRIPLE BERRY CIDER
Semi-sweet hard apple cider made with boysenberry, raspberry, and blueberry. | ABV: 6.0%
MEAD
PEACHY KEEN SESSION MEAD
A low abv effervescent variation of mead made with peaches and wildflower honey. A sweet and fruity peach ring in glass. | ABV: 5.1%
WINE
IMAGERY Chardonnay
CHLOE Ros√©
TRIBUTE Cabernet Sauvignon
NON-ALCOHOLIC
Sparkling Seltzer
FM Kombucha
Boylans Root Beer / Cola / Diet Cola / Ginger Ale / Shirley Temple / Orange / Sparkling Lemonade
Hoplark Citra 0.0%
Hoplark The Really Hoppy One 0.0%
Estrella Galicia 0.0% NA
PACKAGE
6-PACKS + SINGLE CANS (12 OZ)
72 Pale Ale
DRIFT Session Brown
HONEY BEE Citrus Blonde Ale
URSA American IPA
VEGA Blonde Ale
WAKULLA Hefeweizen
4-PACKS + SINGLE CANS (16 OZ)
73 Hazy Pale Ale
BRIGHTSIDE CIDER
DEVILS MILHOPPER West Coast IPA
HEAD BEER COACH 1966 American Lager
INDIGO Schwarzbier
KARST WITH HERBS Belgian-Style Pale Ale
PAW-SOME Pilsner
SALTWATER INTRUSION Raspberry + Lime Gose
TIGER SHARK Hazy IPA
TRAELER‚ÄôS CZECH Bohemian-Style Pilsner
VARIETY PACKS
STAFF PICKS variety 6-pack (12 OZ)
Row Backgrounds
Hours & Food Truck Schedule
Vendor schedule is subject to weather, please call us at (352)727-4677 with any questions.
TUESDAY 8/19 ‚Äî 3-10 PM
Food Truck: GERMAINS
ü§ì FM BRAINAHOLICS TRIVIA @ 7 PM
WEDNESDAY 8/20‚Äî 3-10 PM
Food Truck: TAINO ROOTS
üèÉ Running Tabs Run Club ‚Äî 6:15 PM
THURSDAY 8/21 ‚Äî 3-10 PM
Food Truck: EDDY‚ÄôS PATTY
FRIDAY 8/22 ‚Äî 2-11 PM
Food Trucks: BONE OF MY BONE + TOMMYKNOCKERS
SATURDAY 8/23 ‚Äî 2-11 PM
Food Trucks:¬† FRENCHMEN + CARIBBEAN SPICE
Sooza Album Release ‚Äî 6-9 PM ft. Live Music from Sooza, Trustfall, and Sammy Paradise
SUNDAY 8/24 ‚Äî 2-8 PM
Food Truck: SOUL SPICE
